# probounds.calculate_bounds_experimental { #probounds.probounds.calculate_bounds_experimental }

```python
probounds.calculate_bounds_experimental(df_experimental)
```

Calculate bounds directly from experimental data.

## Parameters {.doc-section .doc-section-parameters}

| Name            | Type      | Description                                                      | Default    |
|-----------------|-----------|------------------------------------------------------------------|------------|
| df_experimental | FrameLike | Experimental dataset containing ``trt`` and ``outcome`` columns. | _required_ |

## Returns {.doc-section .doc-section-returns}

| Name   | Type               | Description                                                         |
|--------|--------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
|        | dict\[str, float\] | Lower and upper bounds of the benefit for the experimental dataset. |
